oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new anthracenyl-imino-glucosyl conjugate (L) selectively senses Hg(2+) by turn-on fluorescence with a 13 +/- 1 fold enhancement by forming a 2:1 complex in pH 5 to 10 even in the presence of several biologically and ecologically relevant metal ions, with a 25 +/- 2% fluorescence enhancement at the EPA limit of 2 ppb. L is equally sensitive towards Hg(2+) in the presence of albumin proteins and in blood serum and milk.
